oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dithiaheterocycle-annelated tetrathiafulvalene pi-donors: a structure-property correlation study
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KUMAR, EVKS
SINGH, JD
SINGH, HB
DAS, K
YAKHMI, JV
BUTCHER, RJ
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: crystal-structure
electron-donors
organic metals
ttf
superconductors
chemistry
moiety
cage
unit
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Single-crystal X-ray structures of BEDT-TTF analogues 3, 6, 7 and 7a along with the preparation of a range of new cation-radical salts derived from these x-electron donors are reported. Physical properties (i.e. colour, cyclic voltammetry data and solid-state conductivities of the derived cation-radical salts) of the donors are discussed in terms of their crystal and molecular structures. The synthesis of compound 7 has been re-investigated. An efficient synthesis of both isomers 7 and 7a along with the other related TTF derivatives is presented. The crystal structure of the precursor thione 10 is also described.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF THE CHEMICAL SOCIETY-PERKIN TRANSACTIONS 1, (11), 1769-1777
